extendedInfo.description: The most beautiful and versatile System Monitor for Android! This application provides real time system load statistics and important information in the form of text and fancy graphs. It is a bundle of 6 in 1 where you are able to monitor CPU, RAM, I/O, Network, Apps and your Battery so you are actually paying for 6 applications together in a single one!Comparing to the Lite version this application unlocks monitoring in the forms of: - Notification bar- Floating apps- Widgets- DashClock lockscreen widget extensions- Saving and scheduling of background monitoring sessionsGrasp the full power of customization and configure features, such as:- The algorithm you prefer the most for calculating the remaining battery time;- The update interval of real time monitoring, in order to spare system resources;- Monitor total CPU usage or individual CPU cores (if your device has more than 1 CPU core).WARNING: Expanded notifications only works on Jelly Bean+ due to API limitations.Misc:- Help translating! https://crowdin.net/project/system-monitorGraphics:- Feature graphics made by www.johnxde.com #Permissions explained:- DRAW OVER OTHER APPS: This permission is needed in order to display the floating app option.- RUN AT STARTUP: This permission is need in case that you want your notifications to start on boot.

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Bought the full version within 10 mins of trying the lite version. Great functionality combined with great design. Neat widgets and floating monitor windows. All very good.  Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Michael Brewer

reviews.title: very nice tool
reviews.comment: ... but it uses too much memory for me. great to watch your system live and that\'s already a lot !
reviews.author: Jerome Desprez

reviews.title: All 5 Stars!
reviews.comment: Very good Christian. Keep up this fantastic work!
reviews.author: Steve Kluver

reviews.title: Ummmmm.... WOW!
reviews.comment: That last update just blew my socks off. I mean, this thing is one of the most well-rounded and smooth system monitors on the market right now, not to mention GORGEOUS. HIGHLY recommended. The paid version is well worth the measly 4$ the dev is asking.
reviews.author: Anirudh S

reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.comment: This app is the best and most visually stunning system monitor on the market. It is fantastic. Best there is. In highly recommend it. Unbelievable. I cannot overstate how wonderful it is. $2.99 is an absolutes steal.
reviews.author: Paul David Thomas

reviews.title: Severe System Lag...
reviews.comment: ...when I turn RAM Monitoring on. Not sure if it does it with CPU Monitoring and the others as well, haven\'t tested them.
reviews.author: Haroon Ikhlaq

reviews.comment: Excellent design and functionality
reviews.author: Matthias Bauer

reviews.title: Awesome system monitoring application
reviews.comment: Brian Klug recommended this, and it is truly awesome. The only issue is that on the HTC One, the CPU states fails to display anything with the message \"frequencies file not found\"
reviews.author: Billy O\'Neal

reviews.title: Way better than the \"System Panel\"  app
reviews.comment: Way better than the \"System Panel\"  app
reviews.author: Palak D

reviews.title: The best system analyzer
reviews.comment: The best way to really know what\'s happening with your device
reviews.author: Frederico Corda

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Get the paid version as it has a lot of features.
reviews.author: Ross Randall

reviews.title: Very useful app and gorgeous UI but uses a lot of RAM
reviews.comment: I can only hope that android 4.4 will look something like this. The only issue I have is that it uses about 100 megabytes of RAM, which is a substantial amount for a single app with my Nexus 10.
reviews.author: Kiol Cailteux

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Worth.
reviews.author: howard thirtle

reviews.title: summary page will be great
reviews.comment: nice widgets! I hope the developer can implement a summary page of all graphs and stats in one page and widget!
reviews.author: JC de Dios

reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
reviews.comment: Wow, you\'ve struck a great balance between form and function. Props to Franco Kernel development, Francisco Franco, for turning me onto your app. 7/27 Love the update!
reviews.author: Stephen Prentice

reviews.comment: Great look
reviews.author: Jared Leitch

reviews.title: Absolutely Stunning
reviews.comment: The new Holo look is amazing but PLEASE remove the all-capital side menu items!
reviews.author: Blake Irwin

reviews.title: Must have app
reviews.comment: One of my favorite apps. Loving the new update.
reviews.author: Danny Kees

reviews.title: pretty good
reviews.comment: good,but stops
reviews.author: Elizabeth Stevenson

reviews.title: Beautiful!!
reviews.comment: By far one of the most beautiful apps available on Android, and the functionality is neatly unsurpassed.  A MUST HAVE for any phone nerd.
